allow: Bash(python3 -c "from livekit.agents import Agent; import inspect; print\(inspect.signature\(Agent.__init__\)\)")
Bash(uv run python -c "from livekit.agents import AgentSession; import inspect; print\(inspect.getfile\(AgentSession\)\)")
Bash(uv run python -c "from livekit.agents.voice.agent_activity import AgentActivity; import inspect; print\(inspect.getfile\(AgentActivity\)\)")
Bash(uv run python -c "from openai.types.beta.realtime.session import TurnDetection; import inspect; print\(inspect.getsource\(TurnDetection\)\)")
